channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 2 large potholes coming down hill, 28th February
item.description:
Dangerous potholes after the left turn going down hill. This could really damage someone's car or cause an accident
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole on the bend, 27th February
item.description:
Near the wall of reservoir. It’s on opposite side of road to another 3 potholes. To avoid it you have to drive into the middle of the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aggs Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 large potholes, 27th February
item.description:
On the road near the dirt track. 3 large potholes that are getting larger each day. You need to swerve into the middle of the road to miss them
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aggs Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 27th February
item.description:
Multiple potholes as you turn into left into Birdlip road from harp hill
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aggs Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All street lights out in Ash close culdesac and all along one side of maple drive, 27th February
item.description:
All street lights on the culdesac ash close are out and have been out since Xmas. It’s extremely dark and feels unsafe. I have to use my phone light to see where I am walking it’s so dark. With the alleyway leading into the beeches park from the close range t feel like a really unsafe place to be at night.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Ash Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large, possibly 3-4 foot long pothole middle of the road at the junction with Windyridge Rd, 27th February
item.description:
Middle of the road at the junction of Windyridge Rd
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Windyridge Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Various verges are a mess in BrooklandsPark. Including Kew Place, 27th February
item.description:
Deep holes in the verges along Brooklands Park in various areas. These are trip hazards in the dark. Also opposite Kew Place by the Sub station. This has been reported before. BT cables are in the verge.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brooklands Park, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole situated towards centre of road when heading towards Hare & Hounds Traffic Lights from Churchdown, 27th February
item.description:
This pothole was previously mended but has deteriorated in a very short space of time. It is causing cars to move to avoid it and ‘debris’ from pothole is causing a further hazard
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Danger in Hatherley Lane, 27th February
item.description:
With the street lights STILL out in the Wade Court area, the two new islands offer potential for a fatal accident. During the daytime when the traffic is quite heavy, residents are trapped in Wade Court. I also think the zebra crossing being erected near the Nuffield is in the wrong position.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wade Court, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is supposed to be a mini roundabout but the white isn’t there anymore so easy to mistake it as a normal junction, 27th February
item.description:
As you come down Parabola road towards Montpellier there is supposed to be a mini roundabout & you can no longer see it as such as the which has gone. Very difficult if you are a tourist
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of pot holes on roundabout, 27th February
item.description:
The mini roundabout by the community center. Lots of pot holes. It is very difficult to safely navigate the roundabout due to the number of pot holes. Can you please fix asap? Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Approx 2’x10”x2”. Couldn’t take proper measurements as in a very busy main road, Princess Elizabeth Way. Almost opposite Cowper Rd., 27th February
item.description:
As stated above! Almost opposite Cowper Road heading north on P.E.Way. Just off the GCHQ roundabout. I have no idea how long the issue has been present. It blew my tyre. I had my grandchildren in the car and as a result couldn’t get home for at least 3 hours. I called the RAC and asked if this could be related to pothole's, he agreed! It’s cost me £148 to get a new tyre fitted for which I need compensation.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Give Way Pinch Point Unsafe, 27th February
item.description:
The right of way pinch point north west of Vineries Close cannot cope with current traffic and does not work. It is too long to create safe visibility splays and is now causing drivers to mount the cycle path and there are near misses with school children and pedestrians. Another solution is needed, consultation required. One way system?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Futher potholes on Kidnappers Lane, 27th February
item.description:
The extremely high volume of traffic and the weather conditions have caused additional potholes on kidnappers lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kidnappers Lane Unsafe, 27th February
item.description:
Kidnappers Lane between Vineries Close and the pear trees development has lost its kerb on the western side. This is now unsafe due to cars not being able to judge distance from edge and driving away from the edge and blocking the carriageway causing vehicles in opposite direction to mount the shared cycle path.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
